gitNotInstalled.title: Git Not Installed
gitNotInstalled.message: Git CLI is required for Axis to function. Please install Git and restart the application.

fontSize.label: Font Size
fontSize.hint: Base font size for the interface (10-24)

showLineNumbers.label: Show line numbers
showLineNumbers.description: Display line numbers in diff and file views

autoUpdate.label: Check for updates automatically
autoUpdate.description: Automatically check for new versions on startup

avatars.title: Avatars

gravatar.label: Enable Gravatar
gravatar.description: Show Gravatar avatars for commit authors when integration is not connected

avatars.cacheHint: Remove all cached avatar images. They will be re-fetched as needed.

historyCapacity.label: Notification History Capacity
historyCapacity.hint: Maximum number of notifications to keep in history (10-200)

signing.title: Commit Signing

format.label: Signing Format
format.hint: Choose GPG or SSH for signing commits

key.label: Signing Key
key.hintGpg: Select your GPG key or enter a key ID
key.noKeysFound: No {{format}} keys found on this system

gpgProgram.label: GPG Program (optional)
gpgProgram.hint: Custom path to GPG executable (leave empty for auto-detect)

sshProgram.label: SSH Program (optional)
sshProgram.hint: Custom path to ssh-keygen executable (leave empty for auto-detect)

signing.noKeyFound: No signing key found in git config

contextLines.label: Context Lines
contextLines.hint: Number of context lines to show in diffs (0-20)

wordWrap.label: Word wrap in diff view
wordWrap.description: Wrap long lines in diff view

sideBySide.label: Side-by-side diff view
sideBySide.description: Show diffs in split view by default

spellCheck.label: Spell check commit messages
spellCheck.description: Enable spell checking in commit message editor

conventionalCommits.label: Enable conventional commits
conventionalCommits.description: Use structured commit message format (type[scope]: description)

customScopes.label: Custom Scopes
customScopes.hint: Comma-separated list of scopes for quick access (e.g., ui, api, auth)

enabled.label: Enable AI commit messages
enabled.description: Generate commit messages from staged changes using AI

ollamaUrl.label: Ollama URL
ollamaUrl.hint: URL of your Ollama server (default: http://localhost:11434)

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.connectedDescription: Connected to {{provider}}. You can now view pull requests, issues, and CI status in the sidebar.
integrations.connectDescription: Connect to {{provider}} to access pull requests, issues, CI/CD status, and notifications.
integrations.authNote: Note: You will be redirected to {{provider}} to authorize Axis. After authorization, you will be returned to the app automatically.
integrations.aboutDescription: Axis can connect to your Git hosting provider to show additional information:

features.pullRequests: Pull/Merge Requests - view, create, and merge PRs
features.cicd: CI/CD Status - see build and test status for commits

sshKeys.title: SSH Keys
sshKeys.description: Manage SSH keys stored in ~/.ssh for authentication with remote repositories.
sshKeys.noKeysHint: Generate or import an SSH key to get started.

algorithm.label: Algorithm
algorithm.hint: Ed25519 is recommended for most use cases

filename.label: Filename
filename.hint: Name of the key file in ~/.ssh

bits.label: Key Size (bits)
bits.hint: Key size for RSA/ECDSA (ignored for Ed25519)

filename.label: Target Filename
filename.hint: Name for the imported key in ~/.ssh

export.title: Export SSH Key
export.publicOnlyDesc: Only export the public key file (recommended for sharing)

delete.title: Delete SSH Key
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will remove both the private and public key files.

confirmBeforeDiscard.label: Confirm before discarding changes
confirmBeforeDiscard.description: Show confirmation dialog before discarding changes

defaultSshKey.label: Default SSH Key
defaultSshKey.hint: SSH key to use for remote operations when no per-remote key is configured
defaultSshKey.autoDescription: Let Git and SSH agent decide which key to use

warningEnabled.label: Warn about large binary files
warningEnabled.description: Show a warning dialog when staging binary files that exceed the size threshold

threshold.label: Size threshold
threshold.hint: Files larger than this will trigger a warning

validation.cannotStartWithDot: Branch name cannot start with a dot
validation.cannotEndWithSlash: Branch name cannot end with a slash
validation.cannotContainConsecutiveDots: Branch name cannot contain consecutive dots

delete.title: Delete Branch
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the branch "{{name}}"?
delete.forceDelete: Force delete (even if not fully merged)
delete.notFullyMerged: Branch is not fully merged. Check "Force delete" to delete anyway.

deleteRemote.title: Delete Remote Branch
deleteRemote.warning: This will delete the branch from the remote server.
deleteRemote.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{branch}}" from {{remote}}?

rename.title: Rename Branch
rename.alreadyExists: A branch with this name already exists. Check "Force rename" to overwrite.

checkoutConflict.title: Uncommitted Changes
checkoutConflict.message: Your local changes would be overwritten when switching to "{{branch}}". Please choose an option:
checkoutConflict.hint: Stashing will save your changes and can be restored later. Discarding will permanently delete your changes.

compare.title: Compare Branches
compare.selectCommitPrompt: Select a commit to view its changes

dialog.title: Stash Changes
dialog.description: This will stash all the changes in your working copy and return it to a clean state.

stash.applyConflict: Stash applied with conflicts - resolve them to continue
stash.popConflict: Stash applied with conflicts (not dropped) - resolve them to continue

staging.notConventionalFormat: Existing message is not in conventional format

commitForm.amendPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep existing message
commitForm.subject: subject

ignoreDialog.title: Ignore File
ignoreDialog.addToGlobalDesc: Ignore this pattern in all repositories on this machine

lfsWarning.title: Large Binary Files Detected
lfsWarning.message: {{count}} file(s) exceed the size threshold ({{threshold}}). Consider using Git LFS for better performance.
lfsWarning.lfsNotInstalled: Large binary files can slow down cloning, fetching, and increase repository size. Git LFS stores them efficiently outside the main repo.

dialog.title: Merge Branch
dialog.noFastForwardDesc: Always create a merge commit, even if fast-forward is possible
dialog.squashDesc: Combine all commits into a single commit
dialog.commitImmediatelyDesc: If unchecked, merged changes will be staged but not committed
dialog.selectBranchError: Please select a branch to merge

banner.hint: Commit or abort the merge to continue

rebase.title: Rebase Branch
rebase.rebaseDescription: This will replay all commits from {{source}} on top of {{target}}.
rebase.rebaseWarning: Warning: Rebase rewrites commit history. Only rebase commits that haven't been pushed to a shared repository.
rebase.selectBranchError: Please select a branch to rebase onto

cherryPick.title: Cherry Pick
cherryPick.noCommitDesc: Apply changes without creating a commit

revert.title: Revert Commit
revert.revertDescription: Reverting a commit creates a new commit that undoes the changes introduced by the selected commit. This is safe for shared branches as it does not rewrite history.
revert.noCommitDesc: Apply revert changes without creating a commit

bisect.title: Git Bisect
bisect.description: Bisect uses binary search to find the commit that introduced a bug. Specify a known good (working) commit and optionally a bad (broken) commit.
bisect.testAndMark: Test this commit and mark it:

conflictResolver.title: Resolve Conflicts
conflictResolver.selectFile: Select a file to resolve conflicts

interactiveRebase.title: Interactive Rebase
interactiveRebase.historyWarning: Warning: Rebase rewrites commit history. Only rebase commits that haven't been pushed to a shared repository.

notifications.hasConflicts: Rebase has conflicts - resolve and continue

reword.title: Reword Commit
reword.hasConflicts: Conflicts detected. Please resolve and continue.

editPause.title: Rebase Paused for Edit
editPause.paused: The rebase has paused to allow you to edit this commit.
editPause.description: You can now make changes to files, stage them, and they will be added to this commit when you continue.
editPause.step1: Modify files in your working directory
editPause.step2: Stage changes to include them in this commit
editPause.step3: Click Continue when ready to proceed

soft.title: Soft Reset
soft.description: Move branch pointer to target commit. All changes will be kept staged.
soft.warning: This is a safe operation. No changes will be lost.

mixed.title: Mixed Reset
mixed.description: Move branch pointer to target commit. All changes will be kept but unstaged.
mixed.warning: This is a safe operation. No changes will be lost.

hard.title: Hard Reset
hard.description: Move branch pointer to target commit. All changes will be permanently discarded.
hard.warning: This will permanently delete all uncommitted changes. This cannot be undone!

rebasePreview.noCommits: No commits to rebase. Branch is already up to date.

merge.rebaseDescription: This will replay all commits from {{source}} on top of {{target}}.

discard.title: Discard Changes
discard.message: Are you sure you want to discard changes to "{{path}}"? This cannot be undone.
discard.messageAll: Are you sure you want to discard all unstaged changes? This cannot be undone.

deleteFile.title: Delete File
deleteFile.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{path}}"? This cannot be undone.

sidebar.noRepositoryHint: Open a repository to get started

integration.connectInSettings: Connect in Settings to view data

view.title: Submodules
view.removeConfirm: Remove submodule '{{path}}'? This will delete the submodule directory.

addDialog.title: Add Submodule
addDialog.pathHint: Relative path where the submodule will be cloned

delete.title: Delete Tag
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{{name}}"?

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to run "{{name}}"?

editor.shortcutHint: Click and press your shortcut. Backspace to clear.
editor.confirmMessagePlaceholder: Are you sure you want to run this action?

validation.contextRequired: At least one context is required

diff.selectFile: Select a file to view changes

table.author: Author
table.branchCheckedOut: The branch "{{branch}}" is currently checked out at this commit.
table.commitCheckedOut: This commit is currently checked out.

archive.title: Create Archive
archive.prefixHint: Prepended to all file paths in the archive

fileLog.title: Log: {{path}}
fileLog.noCommits: No commits found that modified this file
fileLog.selectCommit: Select a commit to view details

scrollToCommit.notFoundDesc: Commit {{oid}} was not found in loaded history

blame.title: Blame: {{path}}
blame.selectCommitForDetails: Hover over a line to see commit details

notConnected.ciHint: Connect in Settings to view CI/Actions.
notConnected.notificationsHint: Connect in Settings to view notifications.
notConnected.issuesHint: Connect in Settings to view issues.
notConnected.pullRequestsHint: Connect in Settings to view pull requests.

issues.title: Issues
issues.selectIssue: Select an issue to view details

pullRequests.title: Pull Requests
pullRequests.selectPr: Select a pull request to view details

create.title: Create Pull Request
create.notPushed: This branch has not been pushed to the remote yet
create.sourceMustBePushed: Source branch must be pushed to the remote first
create.selectBranchesFirst: Select source and target branches first

fetch.title: Fetch from Remote
fetch.cancelConfirm: A fetch operation is currently in progress. Do you want to cancel it?

passphrase.title: SSH Key Passphrase
passphrase.description: The SSH key "{{keyName}}" is encrypted. Enter the passphrase to unlock it.
passphrase.label: Passphrase

errors.fastForward: Cannot fast-forward. Try disabling "Fast-forward only" or enable rebase.
errors.conflict: Merge conflict detected. Please resolve conflicts manually.
errors.rebase: Rebase required. Please use the command line for interactive rebase.

add.title: Add Worktree
add.description: Create a new worktree linked to this repository. Each worktree can be checked out to a different branch.
add.pathHint: Absolute path or path relative to repository
add.baseHint: Branch or commit to base new branch on
add.branchRequired: Branch name is required (or select detached HEAD)

remove.title: Remove Worktree
remove.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the worktree at:

clone.title: Clone Repository
clone.cloningMessage: Cloning repository... This may take a while for large repositories.

init.title: Initialize Repository
init.directoryHint: Select an empty directory or create a new one
init.bareDescription: Bare repositories have no working directory (for servers)

notInstalled.title: Git LFS Not Installed
notInstalled.message: Install Git LFS to track large files

patterns.empty: No tracked patterns. Click + to add one.

identity.title: Git Identity
identity.description: Override the global git identity for this repository only.

signing.title: Commit Signing
signing.description: Override the global signing settings for this repository only.
signing.clearOverridesHint: Remove all per-repository signing settings and use global defaults

sshKey.label: SSH Key
sshKey.saveFailed: Failed to save SSH key for remote
sshKey.removeFailed: Failed to remove SSH key for remote

hooks.title: Git Hooks
hooks.description: Manage Git hooks for this repository. Hooks run automatically during Git operations.

editor.hint: The hook script should start with a shebang (e.g., #!/bin/bash). It will be made executable automatically.

global.title: Global Actions
global.info: Global actions are available in all repositories.

repo.title: Repository Actions
repo.info: Repository actions are stored in .axis/actions.json and can be shared with your team via git.

integration.prsMoreFailed: Failed to load more pull requests: {{error}}
integration.ciRunsMoreFailed: Failed to load more CI runs: {{error}}
integration.markReadFailed: Failed to mark notification as read: {{error}}
integration.markAllReadFailed: Failed to mark all notifications as read: {{error}}

errors.cannotFastForward: Cannot fast-forward, merge or rebase required
errors.checkoutConflict: Checkout conflict: uncommitted changes would be overwritten
